the structur of the the multiprogram system a multiprogram system
is describ in which all activ ar divid over a
number of sequenti process these sequenti process ar place at
variou hierarch level in each of which on or more
independ abstract have been implement the hierarch structur prove to
be vital for the verif of the logic sound of
the design and the correct of it implement cacm mai
1968 dijkstra e w oper system multiprogram system system hierarchi
system structur real time debug program verif synchron primit cooper
sequenti process system level input output buffer multiprogram processor share
